i.name: Unseen Predator
i.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

q.name: Savagery
q.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

w.name: Battle Roar
w.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

e.name: Bola Strike
e.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.

r.name: Thrill of the Hunt
r.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

i1.blurb: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} While in {{tip|brush}} or {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}}, '''Rengar's''' [[basic attack]]s gain {{sti|range|600 '''bonus''' range}} and cause him to {{tip|dash|leap}} to enemies beyond his normal {{tip|melee}} range. This bonus lasts for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds upon exiting brush or stealth.
Leaping when on {{as|0 Ferocity|buzzword3}} generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}}.

{{sbc|Ferocity:}} '''Rengar''' generates {{as|1 Ferocity|buzzword3}} whenever he casts a ''basic [[Champion ability|ability]]''. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} makes his next ability empowered, granting an additional cast along with {{pp|3|key=%|30 to 50|1 to 13|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds at the cost of all {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}}. Reaching {{as|4 Ferocity|buzzword3}} with {{ai|Savagery|Rengar}} or {{ai|Bola Strike|Rengar}} locks its empowered version for {{fd|0.1}} seconds before and after casting it. All {{as|Ferocity|buzzword3}} is lost after being out-of-combat for 8 seconds.

{{sbc|Bonetooth Necklace:}} {{tip|takedown|Takedowns}} within {{fd|1.5}} seconds of being damaged by '''Rengar''' grant him a '''Trophy''' per unique enemy champion (max 5). An [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] additional one is made available through the event [[The Hunt is On!]].
'''Trophies''' grant {{as|{{pp|6|type=[[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|adjustsize|link=]] trophies|key=%|x^2|x;Head of Kha'Zix|formula=(Number of Trophies) * (Number of Trophies)}} '''bonus''' AD}} as {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
i1.name: Unseen Predator
notes: * ''Unseen Predator'' occurs regardless of whether or not ''Rengar's'' target has {{tip|sight}} of him.
* ''Rengar'' will not leap to targets already in his basic attack range.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Rengar'' will only leap to a target if his basic attack timer has been refreshed (if not so he will not automatically attempt to path towards his target, despite them being within leap range).

* ''Rengar'' can freely use any ability mid-leap (the exception being {{ai|Bola Strike|Rengar}} (not) having a small delay depending on whether he cast it before/after he is {{fd|0.25}} seconds away from landing).
* ''Unseen Predator'' will be lost immediately if ''Rengar'' {{si|Flash|Flashes}} outside brush.

* ''Bonetooth Necklace'' uses icons for each stack: [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green.png|20px|border|link=]] 1, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 2.png|20px|border|link=]] 2, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 3.png|20px|border|link=]] 3, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 4.png|20px|border|link=]] 4, [[File:Bonetooth Necklace Green 5.png|20px|border|link=]] 5, and [[File:Head of Kha'Zix.png|20px|border|link=]] '''Head of Kha'Zix'''.

riot.name: Unseen Predator
riot.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

riot.name: Savagery
riot.description:
Rengar's next attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.
riot.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed for his next 2 attacks. The first attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage.

Ferocity effect:
Savagery's damage is increased to {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) and grants Rengar {{ f4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar's''' next two basic attacks within 3 seconds gain {{sti|{{as|40% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, with the first also dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Savagery's'' {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} is modified and grants '''Rengar''' {{as|{{pp|key=%|50 to 101}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Empowered Bonus Physical Damage|{{pp|18|30|45|60|75|90|105|120|135|150|160|170|180|190|200|210|220|230|240|formula = 15 + 15 per level up to 9, then + 10 per level up to 18}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
q1.name: Savagery
notes: * ''(Empowered) Savagery'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rengar's'' previous orders.

* The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects as well as [[life steal]] and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect structures.

riot.name: Battle Roar
riot.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
riot.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for {{ e2 }}% of the damage he took in the last {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.

Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by {{ e5 }}%.

w1.blurb: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rengar''' stores 50% of the [[damage]] he's taken in the last {{fd|1.5}} seconds as ''Grey Health'' (''75% versus monsters'').
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' lets out a battle roar, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to nearby enemies and {{sti|healing|link=true}} '''Rengar''' for his ''Grey Health''.
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Battle Roar's'' {{as|magic damage}} is modified and additionally {{tip|cleanse|cleanses}}.
w1.name: Battle Roar
notes: * ''Battle Roar'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rengar's'' previous orders.

riot.name: Bola Strike
riot.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
riot.tooltip:
Throw a bola, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

e1.blurb: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' throws a bola in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} ''Bola Strike's'' {{as|physical damage}} is modified and {{tip|root|roots}} its target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds.
e1.name: Bola Strike
notes: * If '''Rengar''' presses {{ai|Savagery|Rengar|Q}} or {{ai|Battle Roar|Rengar|W}} during ''Bola Strike's'' cast time, he'll buffer those spells and cast them when ''Bola Strike'' completes.

riot.name: Thrill of the Hunt
riot.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.
riot.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ stealthms }}% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion within {{ selfvisionrange }} range for {{ stealthduration }} seconds.

After the first {{ fadetime }} seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion deals {{ bonusdamage }} physical damage and reduces their Armor by {{ armorshred }} for {{ armorshredduration }} seconds.

Enemy champions within {{ enemydetectionrange }} range and their nearby allies can sense Rengar during Thrill of the Hunt.
Enemies revealed by Thrill of the Hunt stay revealed while they remain in tracking range.
Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.
Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.

r1.blurb: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rengar''' channels his predatory instincts, becoming {{tip|camouflage|camouflaged}} after 2 seconds and gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for the duration. Attacking or casting most spells ends ''Thrill of the Hunt''.
'''Rengar''' gains {{tip|true sight}} of the nearest enemy champion, who he can leap to deal {{as|50% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} for 4 seconds.
The nearest enemy champion to '''Rengar''' alerts all allies within 1200 range about his presence.
r1.name: Thrill of the Hunt
notes: * The enemy have a vision range of '''Rengar''' of 1600 units.
* Enemies revealed by ''Thrill of the Hunt'' stay revealed for the spell's duration.
* The true vision lingers on his target until the leap completes.
